Posts.Content: Silvermist wrote: ugh...first time posting here. Strong family history- including sister. Yearly MRIs to identify any issues. Over the summer I was birads 3 from an mri - an area 7mm. My dr wanted to check again in 6 mos. I went back Monday. MRI found it to be 9mm, birads 4. Had a core needle biopsy yesterday (Thursday). Was MUCH less painful than I anticipated. Now I wait....the dr thinks I will be called Monday or Tuesday. Trying not to freak out.... Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Waiting.... Silvermist Beesie

Posts.Content: Jan 10, 2014 08:45PM Silvermist wrote: imconcerned- I am concerned! Ok, just changed my user name to silvermist- don't want to confuse you. Hmmm my dr called it a mass. But she also stressed it is still small. It is back neAr my chest wall, so can not be felt. I had no tranquilizers. I just looked away the whole time- I did not want to see the needle. I had an ultrasound mri. Wednesday, huh? The nurse called today to check on me- I saw the # and thought it was results- nope, just to see how I am feeling. Everyone was really nice- but I just want to know. I am thinking good thoughts for you.
Posts.Title: Waiting.... Silvermist Beesie

Posts.Content: Jan 10, 2014 09:19PM Silvermist wrote: so glad to hear you asked- I did not think of it until I was home- then I had all sorts of scary thoughts. I looked at the sample they took- so strange. This week has turned me upside down.
